amendment.description: Amendment sought to repeal existing law which authorizes the Secretary of Defense to convey surplus military property to local governments to support local law enforcement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 106-621 to eliminate portions of existing law which authorize the Secretary of Defense to convey surplus military property to local governments at less than fair market prices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 56 - 368 (Roll no. 199).
